pullRequest.title: Fix NPE on duplicate field in record declaration

Purpose

Fixes #20259

nodes.bodyText: Do we need a separate class for this? Can't we just add these cases to https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/v1.1.0/tests/jballerina-unit-test/src/test/java/org/ballerinalang/test/record/OpenRecordNegativeTest.java#L81

nodes.bodyText: The description does not reflect what's being tested IMO.

+type Song record {|
+    string name;
+    int length;
+|};
+
+function duplicateKeyTest1() {
+     Song hello = {
+         name: "hello",
+         length: 1,
+         name: "hello"
+     };
+}
+
+function duplicateKeyTest2() {
+    Song hi;
+    hi = {
+            name: "hi",
+            length: 2,
+            name: "hi"
+        };

commit.message: Fix NPE on duplicate field in record declaration
Add test case for duplicate key as string in record type
